name: Bruti the bear
description:
This is my entry for Ludum Dare 46: Keep it alive.

Was produced for the Jam within 72h.
You control the environment around a bear stuck on an island.
Your goal is to get the bear to eat its food.
Increase your score by also picking up other items, but avoid viruses that get you sick.

Keys:

  • AWSD: Move
  • QE: Turn
  • Space: RAISE/LOWER/REMOVE platform.
  • Tab: Switch platform.
